frontmatter.title: Meta-Prompting

labPresets.initialPrompt: Rewrite this prompt to make it more effective for summarization tasks: "Explain the French Revolution in one paragraph."

examples: Rewrite this prompt to improve clarity: 'Generate a detailed plan for a startup.'
Improve this intent: 'List advantages of renewable energy.'

quiz.q: True or False: Meta-prompting is the practice of writing prompts that help generate or refine other prompts.
Which of the following is a core application of meta-prompting?
